objects.name: System Service Discovery
objects.description: Adversaries may try to get information about registered services. Commands that may obtain information about services using operating system utilities are "sc," "tasklist /svc" using Tasklist, and "net start" using Net, but adversaries may also use other tools as well.
objects.x_mitre_detection: Adversaries may try to get information about registered services. Commands that may obtain information about services using operating system utilities are "sc," "tasklist /svc" using {{LinkById|S0057}}, and "net start" using {{LinkById|S0039}}, but adversaries may also use other tools as well.
